alert.note: Alert for Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 8:35PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Taney County through 900 PM CST... At 834 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Omaha, or 11 miles south of Forsyth, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake... Lake Taneycomo... Protem... Rueter... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southwestern Missouri.
